mapper.select: SELECT M.member_id , M.department_id , concat(M.name, ' ', P.name) name , M.profile_path , P.level FROM Member M INNER JOIN Position P ON M.position_id = P.position_id WHERE M.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY P.level
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member(member_id, department_id, position_id, name, reg_datetime, upt_datetime, del_yn, profile_path) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{departmentId}, #{positionId}, #{name}, #{regDatetime}, #{uptDatetime}, #{delYn}, #{profilePath})
